item.title: Idea: Micropub Browser Extension For Replies!!!!!!!
item.author: brandontreb@gmail.com (|Zero Cool|)
item.description: I LOVE finding sites that support webmentions. For me, it’s an instant subscribe. These are people who are looking to build community on the web in a new way. The process of “replying” and sending a webmention to a post is still a bit cumbersome. Here are the current steps: Read an article that I want to respond to Determine if the article supports webmentions (either they offer a URL box OR you have to view the source to see if they have a webmention endpoint).
